title: [Self-Directed] Portable Network-Based Computer Security Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of computer system operations and network concepts
context.additional_context: Customized Corporate Training for Employees, Emphasizing Security Practical Exercises Applicable to Real Work Environments

learning_goals: Acquiring competency in network scanning and vulnerability analysis in portable educational network environments
Cultivating practical skills in firewall configuration and intrusion detection based on real attack scenarios

Within one week, learners configure an encrypted communication environment (e.g., TLS 1.3) and implement IPSec or OpenVPN security protocols to propose three security measures for a given scenario (e.g., internal document transfer).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
